name: Steel Moons (NES)
description: You have been sent to an enemy star system, and now you must destroy the space stations that are protecting it to win this battle. Choose from 4 different weapons and face off these huge stations, while dodging the great ammount of bullets they shoot at you! This game was designed to be played with an SNES SNES/Hyperkin mouse in controller port 2, but it can be played with a standard controller. The recommended emulator for this game is Mesen
